ygData.subject: Re: Elves and helms
ygData.msgSnippet: well the male one looks like a bird landed on his head.  the female one looks cool, except there are huge pointy ears on the sides which i have never heard
ygData.messageBody:
well the male one looks like a bird landed on his head. the female one
looks cool, except there are huge pointy ears on the sides which i have
never heard anyone liked. my character is female, and i passed on the plate
helms. but we all have our preferences, enjoy your helm!

Shada Silverleaf, level 39 bard, Mith Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: David Rubino [mailto:tigger@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 6:20 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Elves and helms


From: David Rubino <tigger@...>


I am a wood elf bard with a bronze helm, and it is my favorite possesion! I
love the way it looks, and it constantly attracts tons of attention and
compliments . . . I wonder if we are talking about a different helm? Can't
imagine anyone not liking the way mine looks . . .

-Musil
